author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ZPC Otmuchow Plans To Issue Up To 12.7 Mln Series E Shares
text:
Feb 6(Reuters) - ZAKLADY PRZEMYSLU CUKIERNICZEGO OTMUCHOW SA:
* SAID ON MONDAY THAT ITS SHAREHOLDERS WILL VOTE ON MARCH 5 ON SHARE CAPITAL RAISE VIA SERIES E SHARES ISSUE
* PLANS TO RAISE CAPITAL BY NOT LESS THAN 0.20 ZLOTYS AND NOT MORE THAN 2.5 MLN ZLOTYS
* TO ISSUE UP TO 12.7 MLN SERIES E SHARES AT NOMINAL VALUE OF 0.20 ZLOTYS PER SHARE IN CLOSED SUBSCRIPTION
* COMPANYâ€˜S SHAREHOLDERS TO HAVE RIGHTS ISSUE OF 1 NEW SHARE FOR EVERY 1 SHARE HELD
* DAY OF PREEMPTIVE RIGHTS SET ON JUNE 7, 2018 * SERIES E SHARES TO BE PAID FOR IN CASH Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
